data.prayer: Father, encourage the 1,945 believers in Îles Sous-le-Vent to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Îles Sous-le-Vent, French Polynesia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Îles Sous-le-Vent to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 16 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 1,945 believers in Îles Sous-le-Vent to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Îles Sous-le-Vent, French Polynesia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Îles Sous-le-Vent.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Îles Sous-le-Vent, French Polynesia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,945 believers in Îles Sous-le-Vent and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary:
the state of Îles Sous-le-Vent, French Polynesia has a population of 31,800.

We estimate Îles Sous-le-Vent has 1,945 people who might know Jesus, 24,688 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,167 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
